episodes.name: Dominus
episodes.overview: Having no memory of his downfall in "Spartacus: Vengeance," Ashur wakes to find himself the owner of the former House of Batiatus, now known as the House of Ashur. Eager to earn the respect and power he's always desired, Ashur must save face by presenting something novel and new to the arena.

episodes.name: Forsaken
episodes.overview: Ashur navigates the treacherous waters of the Roman elites while Achillia struggles to acclimate to the brutal life of a gladiator in training.

episodes.name: Unworthy
episodes.overview: Korris faces Ashur's wrath and must prove himself worthy.

episodes.name: Blood and Bone
episodes.overview: Ashur desperately maneuvers to secure a place in the upcoming games of the Ludi Apollinares before the imminent arrival of Marcus Crassus.

episodes.name: Goddess of Death
episodes.overview: Ashur presents Achillia to the public, where she faces her first battle in the arena.

episodes.name: Empty Things
episodes.overview: Ashur's popularity within Capua soars, but at a devastating cost.

episodes.name: Deepest Wound
episodes.overview: Korris demands blood; Ashur attempts to sway an enemy toward his cause.
